feed.title: XpressTronics: Wholesale Cell Phone Accessories in Canada

author.name: XpressTronics: Wholesale Cell Phone Accessories in Canada

entry.title: DUDAO PD45W - Type C Cable to Lightning Cable
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Charging Cables
Price: 4.50

  • No More Need Adapters: Connect your iOS devices directly to the new Macbook, using with new USB c charger, USB c power bank.
  • Standard Charging: Metrans USB C to iPhone cable support up to PD 45W charging. Note: Can not support fast charging for iPhone X/8/8Plus, iPad Pro.
  • Charging and Data Transfer: Connect your iPhone, iPad, or iPod with a connector to your MacBook for syncing (up to 480 Mbps) and charging.
  • Complete charge and sync with iPhone, iPod, iPad. The reversible USB-C connector is compatible with Macbook, Chromebook, any other USB c devices.

entry.title: DUDAO 100W - Type C Cable to Type C Cable
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Charging Cables
Price: 4.50

  • Dudao 100W Cable. This 1-meter charge cable with USB-C connectors on both ends is ideal for charging, syncing, and transferring data between USB-C devices.
  • Pair the USB-C Charge Cable with a compatible USB-C power adapter to conveniently charge your devices from a wall outlet and take advantage of fast-charging capabilities.

entry.title: Type-C to 3.5mm Audio Headphone Jack
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Music Players
Price: 1.25

entry.title: Type C to Type C Cable
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Charging Cables
Price: 2.99

  • This 1-meter charge cable with USB-C connectors on both ends is ideal for charging, syncing, and transferring data between USB-C devices.
  • Pair the USB-C Charge Cable with a compatible USB-C power adapter to conveniently charge your devices from a wall outlet and take advantage of fast-charging capabilities.

entry.title: Type C Cable to Lightning Cable (Compatible to Connect iPhone Devices to Mac)
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Charging Cables
Price: 3.45

  • No More Need Adapters: Connect your iOS devices directly to the new Macbook, using with new USB c charger, USB c power bank.
  • Standard Charging: Metrans USB C to iPhone cable support up to 5V 2.4A 12W charging. Note: Can not support fast charging for iPhone X/8/8Plus, iPad Pro.
  • Charging and Data Transfer: Connect your iPhone, iPad, or iPod with a connector to your MacBook for syncing (up to 480 Mbps) and charging (5V 2.4A).
  • Complete charge and sync with iPhone, iPod, iPad. The reversible USB-C connector is compatible with Macbook, Chromebook, any other USB c devices.

entry.title: Type C USB 2.1A Data Charging Cable (Box Packaging)
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Charging Cables
Price: 1.99

  • [FAST CHARGING & FAST DATA SYNC]: The USB Type-C cables are made of high quality, thick four-core copper wires. Guaranteed support for Quick Charge (QC), Adaptive Fast Charging & Turbo Charging standards. Does NOT support OnePlus Dash/Warp charging. The cable also supports data sync at an enhanced transfer speed of up to 480 mb/s. This Type-C cable hence enables sync and charge at the fastest speeds on your devices.
  • [2X THICKER INSULATION]: The Type-C cable has two times thicker insulation than regular cables thus resulting in superior durability and long life. The thicker insulation also importantly improves signal protection from external noise and interferences
  • [BEND TESTED WITH FUSED CONNECTORS]: Cables are bend tested over 5000 times and come with superior fused connectors. The connectors and the cable are unified into one and hence there is no possibility of the connector snagging-off the cable. The cable is engineered to ensure uncompromised long life and durability.
  • [PERFECT LENGTH]: At a perfect length of 1 meter, the cable for Type C devices is ideal for both charging through a wall charger or connectivity with a computer. It’s neither too long nor too short. Just perfect!
  • Please note: This is an aftermarket accessory. All trademarks on this website are the property of their respective owners.

entry.title: Lightning (iPhone) USB Data Charging Cable (Box Packaging)
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Charging Cables
Price: 2.50

  • Ensures complete charge and sync compatibility with All iPhone Devices
  • Excellent quality-multiple protection - over-current, short-circuit and over-temperature protect your device.
  • Featuring a compact design, this power adapter gives fast, efficient charging.
  • Good Charging Speeds Most Powerful - Charge any USB powered devices at top speed continuously.
  • Please note: This is an aftermarket accessory. All trademarks on this website are the property of their respective owners.

What if the iPhone cable is out of work OR it just doesn't meet your expectation?

Designed and built with only premium materials and ensure that your Apple devices are Syncing and Charging safely at maximum speed. Laser-welded connectors ensure superior functionality under heavy usage.

Made for iPhone, iPad, iPod:

Sync wire contains a unique, verified serial number and an authorization chip issued by Apple which means it can be used with any and all of your Apple devices with total peace of mind.

Multi Protect Safety System:

Unique Testing in true-to-life situations ensures ultra-durability and prevents damages from over-charging. -Our cables are tested on at least 3 different Apple devices to ensure that the quality of your charging experience is never compromised.

Complete Charge & Sync Compatibility:

Charging Cable works with iPhone 6s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 5, iPhone 5C, iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPad Air 2, iPad 2017, iPod Nano, and Beats Pill+.

Small Heads works with most of Cell Phone Cases:

Charging Cables have been specifically designed with a Small Head, to be compatible with most back cases for ease of use.

entry.title: 3 in 1 Multi Functional USB Data Cable - Lightning/Micro/Type C (Multi-Colour/ Without Packaging)
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Charging Cables
Price: 2.99

  • Simultaneous Charging: Charge 3 devices simultaneously, all combined in one power cord
  • 3 In 1 Power Cord: IOS cable + Micro cable + USB C cable, this multi USB cable enables intelligent-shut to meet the charging requirements of different interfaces. Only the IOS plug can be used for Data Transfer
  • Wide Compatibility: This multi-charger cable is widely used in IOS interface, Micro interface, and USB-C interface of many equipments. Compatible with iPhone X, iPhone 8/8 Plus, iPhone 7/7 Plus, Samsung Galaxy S8/S8 Plus, Bluetooth headphone, Power bank, Camera, MacBook Pro, Google Pixel, Nexus 6P, and more other USB devices
  • Please note: This is an aftermarket accessory. All trademarks on this website are the property of their respective owners.

entry.title: 2 Meter Micro USB Data Charging Cable (White/Glass Box)
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Charging Cables
Price: 1.99

  • FAST CHARGE & SYNC: Ensure a maximum charging speed & charge faster than most standard cables, and work better for tablets and quick charge devices. Great performance ensures your devices sync and charges simultaneously with up to 480Mb/s transferring speed.
  • Designed to connect micro-USB devices including smartphones to a USB charger or USB Port.
  • Our cables are made with high quality, extra-thick solid copper wire, which facilitates faster charge and data transmission. This cable allows you to connect your smartphone to your laptop/PC in order to charge your phone and sync/exchange data simultaneously.
  • [Strong & Tangle Free Design]: Made up of premium quality material. Strong TPE Material with soft unbreakable cable made of environment-friendly TPE material, not easy to broken.
  • COMPATIBLE WITH: Android and Windows phones, tablets and many other Micro Usb devices including Samsung / Nexus / HTC / Motorola / Nokia / LG / Sony / Blackberry / PS4 / Kindle / Xbox / PS Vita / Nintendo DS / GPS devices / battery packs / bluetooth speakers / wireless keyboards / cameras / camcorders / games consoles / hard drives / e-readers / printers and Micro Usb Compatible devices.
  • Please note: This is an aftermarket accessory. All trademarks on this website are the property of their respective owners.
